actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to extend the 20-year protection to ratings for children permanently incapable of self-support.

summary.text: Extends a twenty-year protection to ratings for veterans' children permanently incapable of self-support. States that such twenty-year protection of the rating may only be revoked upon a showing that the rating was based on fraud. (Amends 38 U.S.C. 110)

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to extend the 20-year protection to ratings for children permanently incapable of self-support.
